review.comment: The Hypop team are always a delight to deal with. They're patient and so helpful, ready to answer any and all questions. Their chat function is quick and convenient - one of the reps, Irma, helped me find suitable lighting solutions. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Hi Tanya, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: Great customer service. Irma was so kind to answer all of my questions and help me with everything I was looking for on their website. They have really good products, great sales and I am looking forward to order from Hypop everything I need for my photography. Thank you :-)
review.review_reply: Hi Anita, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: Made a few purchases online via Hypop and they've always been very responsive and helpful with my order. Irma was very quick in clarifying a few enquiries for my recent one. Being in customer service, communication is always key to keep the customers happy! Thanks again Irma.

Thank you Elliot and team of HYPOP ✨

review.comment: Great shop.. the staff were awesome.. super helpful.. helped fix up my click & collect order I stuffed up.. cool to look around & buy a few more tings & stuff & that..
review.review_reply: Hi Jamie, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We are so glad you had a great experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment:
I was so impressed with the customer service and the extra mile this company goes. They kept me updated with the movements of the item I purchased from the time I ordered, right up to the time it was delivered.

I ordered the Ruby light and what an incredible product. I was quite honestly not expecting it to be such good quality because of how reasonably prices it was and to my surprise it was better than I could have imagined. This light has 3 different light functions and you can increase and decrease the luminosity. It’s great for lives or online video calls and would highly recommend to anyone for looking for highly quality products and lighting at such an affordable price.

Thank you Hypop!! I will definitely be recommending your company to all my friends in need of your products.

Andrea
review.review_reply: Hi Andrea, thank you so much for your glowing review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience with us. Enjoy your new Ruby Ring Light and we hope to see you again soon!

review.comment:
Elliot was amazing - provided such great service, was really thorough, and showed me how to set the equipment up.
Unfortunately the showroom was closed for 1.5 hours so I had to wait to shop but Elliot made the experience more positive.
review.review_reply: Hi Lauren, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: Great shop, and good prices. I found exactly what I needed thanks to Eliott who took the time to help me. 👍🏻
review.review_reply: Hi Lena, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: Excellent customer service! Ellaine and Brian were especially helpful. Brian was extremely helpful when I made a mistake on the shipment address for an order and quickly got in contact to prevent any issue. thanks sincerely!
review.review_reply: Hi Mochael, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment:
Items showing as “In Stock” simply aren’t.
Apparently that means on back order now.
This is one way businesses are getting customers to fork over their money without actually having any stock.
Won’t be back to Hypop again. Dodgy business that isn’t professional whatsoever.
Refund my money. FYI it’s not a courtesy email, when you lied about having stock!
Very impressed with the same day dispatch and customer service. Pricing is competitive too. Hypop is usually my first go-to when I look for studio gear.
review.review_reply: Hi Duc, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment:
As a photographer who uses a lot of paper backdrops, Hypop is the go-to place I'd recommend. They stock full and half sizes which I'm a fan of.
(I only have half rolls due to the lack of space in my home studio)
With a physical store in Alexandria, it's so convenient to pop in and see what colours suit the client brief perfectly. Also, the Hypop team are really lovely people! Shout out to Brian for the ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ service.
review.review_reply: Hi Juliet, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment:
Overnight shipping to regional nsw was amazing. Great customer service. Easy to contact and super helpful.

First time buyer from these guys!
review.review_reply: Hi Dan, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment:
A real customer focused organisation!
My second purchase from Hypop within a week.
Both deliveries were in my hand within 24hours of order, to say I was impressed is an understatement!
I had a question regarding one of the items which I was purchasing so I contacted the store directly and was promptly informed of the information I required.
The gentleman I was speaking with on the phone went above and beyond to help me out. The website and ordering system is user friendly and their impeccable dispatch times are a relief when you have a fast approaching deadline as I did.
I will be recommending Hypop to anyone I can.
review.review_reply: Hi Ben, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience with us. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: I ordered a softbox online from Sydney and it was delivered within 24 hours to regional Victoria! In the week before Christmas too! Excellent service all round - well done.

Kind Regards,
The Hypop Team

My light also works amazingly. Very happy!

review.review_reply: Hi Victor, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We appreciate it so much and we're always happy to help with any questions you may have. We hope to see you again soon at Hypop.

review.comment: I was stoked with the delivery time! Unfortunately, I received a Godox AD300Pro that was completely faulty… it just would not turn on(Godox issue, not Hypop). I was contacted the very next morning and informed that they were sending me a replacement light and a return label. I was upset at first but great support and communication prevailed. Def Recommend 💯
review.review_reply:
Hi Charles,

Thanks for the positive review and we're glad we were able to get this resolved by having a brand new replacement unit arranged. Sorry for any inconvenience caused!

We hope to see you back soon!

Kind Regards,
The Hypop Team

review.comment: The absolute best service of any online business I have ever ordered from. I am sitting here with the order I ordered yesterday afternoon. No fuss, it was just packed and sent and arrived. I ordered a while ago from a competitor and no one even emailed me to let me know the product was on back order and would take 6 weeks, even though I had paid for express. So I know where I will be going from now on. Thank you!

review.comment:
Worst customer service ever, if I could award 0 stars, I would. Stay clear of their false promisises and gaurentees. They won't price match other Sydney based or Australian based retailers as stated, and are quick to hold your basket orders until the code given or used expires...then then state, they can't give you that price any longer. Use other official photography retailers, they will all price match and are willing to help you get the best price and want your business...this lot don't seem to want your business.

In response to their comment below...

Shame on you, a good retailer would say no problem, let me fix that price up for you now. As one other retialer did, just the shear mention of your bad service, and they honored your price without question. No excuses, no holding responses to questions or baskets until a price expires.

Yes, you did offer a first time buyer discount of 5% that would have brought it to $15 of the original price....that's not the point, it's still $15 more then it was just hours before....you've lost my trust and confidence, and I wouldn't feel consumer confident in purchasing anything from you at any price...nor should anyone else.
review.review_reply:
Hi Bob,

Thanks for your feedback and we apologise for the experience you've had. As mentioned in an email and also via a phone conversation the Godox Spring Sale was a promotion that exclusively ran from September 13 - September 19, 2021 therefore the sale itself expired before you completed the purchase. There were no codes that expired, the sale itself ended. Godox are strict on enforcing their promotions and pricing across the board which is why you'll notice that all official retailers, including ourselves, maintain the same price for their products. We did offer you a 5% first time customer discount which would've brought the product's price to within $15 of the sale price however this was rejected.

We're happy to price match any official Australian based retailers with a physical store front just like our own (not eBay or Amazon) however if they are Godox retailers, they'll mostly likely be maintaining the same pricing across the board as mentioned above.

Sorry for the inconvenience caused. Hopefully when the next Godox sale comes around you'll be able to jump on the limited sales period in time.

Kind Regards,
Hypop Customer Service
